fields.summary: plexus-io : unit fail on windows with rev 7134

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.description:
With rev 7134 and on windows
I have the following failure :
{noformat}
Running org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.filemappers.ResourcesTest
Tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 0.375 sec <<< FAILURE!
testFileCollection(org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.filemappers.ResourcesTest)
 Time elapsed: 0.031 sec  <<< ERROR!
java.io.IOException: File target\plexus.io.testDir\files\x\b unable to be deleted.
        at org.codehaus.plexus.util.FileUtils.forceDelete(FileUtils.java:1061)

        at org.codehaus.plexus.util.FileUtils.forceDelete(FileUtils.java:1053)
        at org.codehaus.plexus.util.FileUtils.cleanDirectory(FileUtils.java:1234)
        at org.codehaus.plexus.util.FileUtils.deleteDirectory(FileUtils.java:1190)
        at org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.filemappers.ResourcesTest.createFiles(ResourcesTest.java:43)
        at org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.filemappers.ResourcesTest.testFileCollection(ResourcesTest.java:223)

        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAcces
{noformat}

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
fix in rev 7135
Upgrade p-u version which integrate change made in [rev 3033|http://fisheye.codehaus.org/changelog/plexus/?cs=3033]
